data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 2, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Sendai's Ryutaro Iio misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Hayato Shimizu signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Sendai's half.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Alexandre Guedes for the away team is judged to be offside.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Sendai.
Alexandre Guedes of Sendai smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 8, Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sendai take a 0-1 lead thanks to Alexandre Guedes.
In the minute 13, Yokohama Marinos's Ryo Takano gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sendai defender.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Hayato Shimizu awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Alexandre Guedes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sendai.
Junior Santos for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos's Ryo Takano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 21, Hayato Shimizu awards Sendai a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos push forward at Nissan Stadium and Junior Santos gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sendai defence.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
In the minute 24, Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yokohama Marinos drives forward and Erik gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Sendai are coming forward and Para gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 29, Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Takuma Nishimura for Sendai has been booked by Hayato Shimizu and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sendai.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In the minute 33, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sendai.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Sendai at Nissan Stadium.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sendai pushes forward through Ryo Germain, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 39, Free kick Sendai.
Goal! Marcos Junior levels the match at 1-1.
Erik with an assist there.
In the minute 41, Takuma Nishimura of Sendai gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hayato Shimizu awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Hayato Shimizu awards the home team a throw-in.
Important block from the Sendai defence as Kota Mizunuma fires in a strike for Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos's Takahiro Ogihara breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Sendai at Nissan Stadium.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Sendai needs to be cautious. Yokohama Marinos have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Yokohama.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
Ryohei Michibuchi is replacing Ryo Germain for Sendai at Nissan Stadium.
In Yokohama, Alexandre Guedes of Sendai is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 47, Sendai are pushing forward but Ryutaro Iio's finish is wide of the goal.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
In the minute 50, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 53, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Hayato Shimizu signals a Sendai throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
In the minute 55, In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos drive forward through Junior Santos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kota Mizunuma (Yokohama Marinos) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Hayato Shimizu signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Sendai's area.
In the minute 56, Takashi Kiyama is making the team's second substitution at Nissan Stadium with Shun Nagasawa replacing Alexandre Guedes.
Sendai's Ryohei Michibuchi is whistled for offside at Nissan Stadium.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 60, Yokohama Marinos's Kota Mizunuma misses with an attempt on goal.
Throw-in for Sendai at Nissan Stadium.
Hayato Shimizu awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Yokohama Marinos are coming forward and Kota Watanabe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos attack through Junior Santos. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 63, Sendai have a goal kick.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 68, Kota Mizunuma (Yokohama Marinos) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Erik is on target to give Yokohama Marinos a 2-1 advantage.
The away team replace Shogo Nakahara with Keiya Shiihashi.
In the minute 72, The away team have replaced Takuma Nishimura with Kunimitsu Sekiguchi. This is the fourth substitution made today by Takashi Kiyama.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Yokohama Sendai's Shun Nagasawa is caught offside.
In the minute 75, Goal! Erik extends Yokohama Marinos's lead to 3-1.
That's a fine assist from Junior Santos.
Throw-in Sendai.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a first substitution, with Daizen Maeda replacing Erik.
Yokohama Marinos make their second substitution with Ado Onaiwu replacing Junior Santos.
In the minute 78, Edigar Junio is replacing Marcos Junior for the home team.
Kota Mizunuma of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 79, Hayato Shimizu awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Yokohama.
Throw-in Sendai.
Takumi Mase is on a sub for Ryutaro Iio for Sendai.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Sendai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
The home team replace Kota Mizunuma with Yuki Otsu.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Ado Onaiwu for Yokohama Marinos drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Edigar Junio for Yokohama Marinos is whistled offside.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sendai are pushing forward but Keiya Shiihashi's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Yokohama Marinos's Edigar Junio gets in a shot on goal at Nissan Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yuki Otsu (Yokohama Marinos) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
